data.comment: The match has started at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In the minute 2, Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Kobe.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Kobe.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Kobe is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 8, Hayato Shimizu signals a Kobe throw-in in Shonan's half.
Free kick Shonan.
Yuto Iwasaki for Shonan gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 9, Kobe have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Kanagawa Kobe attack through Yutaro Oda. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 11, Hayato Shimizu awards Shonan a goal kick.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
Shonan are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 13, Hayato Shimizu awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Kobe in the half of Shonan.
In the minute 17, Throw-in high up the field for Kobe in Kanagawa.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Shonan.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Kobe's Yutaro Oda gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 25, Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Throw-in for Kobe close to the penalty box.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In the minute 28, Kobe have a dangerous throw-in.
Kobe's Kyogo Furuhashi breaks free at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kanagawa.
In the minute 30, Can Shonan capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kobe's half?
Corner awarded to Kobe.
Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 32, Shonan needs to be cautious. Kobe have an attacking throw-in.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 36, In Kanagawa, Kyogo Furuhashi of Kobe is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
Hayato Shimizu awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 40, Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kobe drives forward and Sergi Samper gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
In the minute 42, Hirofumi Watanabe's header is off-target for Kobe.
Shonan have a goal kick.
Hayato Shimizu signals a free kick to Kobe in their own half.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Kobe in the half of Shonan.
Kobe are caught offside.
Hayato Shimizu signals a Shonan throw-in in Kobe's half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Shonan have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
Kazunari Ono (Shonan) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 47, Noriaki Fujimoto of Kobe gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kanagawa.
Ball goes out of play for a Kobe goal kick.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Shonan move into a 1-0 lead through a Kazuki Oiwa header.
That's a fine assist from Hirokazu Ishihara.
In the minute 52, Shonan pushes forward through Naoki Ishihara, whose finish on goal is saved.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Goal! Kobe go level at 1-1 through Gotoku Sakai in Kanagawa.
In the minute 53, Great play from Kyogo Furuhashi to set up the goal.
Hayato Shimizu signals a Shonan throw-in in Kobe's half.
Hayato Shimizu awards Kobe a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Kobe in their own half.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Kobe.
In the minute 59, Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Kobe.
Shonan to take a throw-in in Kobe territory.
In the minute 61, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Shonan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
At Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka, Shonan are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 62, Hayato Shimizu awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Kobe in their own half.
Sergi Samper of Kobe smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 64, Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Kobe.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kobe's half?
Goal kick for Kobe at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 66, Shonan make their second substitution with Sho Hiramatsu replacing Temma Matsuda.
Shota Kobayashi is on a sub for Takuya Okamoto for Shonan.
Hayato Shimizu signals a free kick to Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kanagawa.
In the minute 70, Kobe drive upfield and Kyogo Furuhashi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Shonan defender.
Takuya Yasui is replacing Sergi Samper for Kobe at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
The away team replace Yutaro Oda with Keijiro Ogawa.
In Kanagawa Kobe attack through Kyogo Furuhashi. The finish is off target, however.
Shonan have a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Hayato Shimizu signals a Shonan throw-in in Kobe's half.
Keijiro Ogawa of Kobe smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kobe have been awarded a corner by Hayato Shimizu.
In the minute 78, Naoki Ishihara (Shonan) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Akimi Barada is replacing Mitsuki Saito for the home team.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
In the minute 80, Throw-in Shonan.
Can Kobe get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Ryo Nemoto is replacing Naoki Ishihara for the home team.
In the minute 87, Bin Ukishima (Shonan) is making a fourth substitution, with Satoshi Tanaka replacing Hirokazu Ishihara.
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hirofumi Watanabe (Kobe) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Kobe awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hayato Shimizu awards Kobe a goal kick.
Kobe awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kobe to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Hayato Shimizu signals a Kobe throw-in in Shonan's half.
Corner awarded to Shonan.
The match has come to a close in Kanagawa. The final score is 1-1.
